hedline.hl1: White Plains Hospital Offers Online Visits

abstract.p: VisitingOurs.com of New York is building computer kiosks around White Plains Hospital Center through which patients can open their own Web pages to let family mmebers know how they are doing (S)

block.p: Patients at White Plains Hospital Center can now open their own Web pages to let family members know how they're doing. A Manhattan-based company, VisitingOurs.com, is spending $40,000 to build nine computer kiosks around the hospital with access to its Web site, which can also be visited from any computer with Internet service.

To create a page, a patient or family member simply enters personal information and the names of the people the patient wants to give access to. Users can also buy gifts for the patient by way of links to retailers.

The service has lightened the load on hospital staff, said Karen Lombardi, a hospital spokeswoman, who said that White Plains is the first hospital anywhere to offer such a service.
